text: Atahpara isa (ah) yakhana bani isarayilera kuphari samparke upalabdhi karate paralena, takhana balalena, kara ache allahara pathe amake sahayya karabe? Sangi-sathira balalo, amara rayechi allahara pathe sahayyakari. Amara allahara prati imana enechi. Ara tumi saksi thaka ye, amara hukuma kabula kare niyechi.
